title: Mixed model reference implementations
description: Concise reference implementations to fit (generalized) linear mixed models in Python

title: Structure learning for Bayesian networks
description: A Python notebook on structure MCMC to learn the structure of a Bayesian network using PyMC3

title: Truncated stick breaking in Greta
description: An example implementation on Dirichlet process mixtures using trunctated stick breaking in the probabilistic programming language Greta

description: An example notebook for simulation-based calibration for validation of Bayesian inferences

title: Dirichlet process mixture models
description: Stan models on infinite Bayesian mixtures using the Dirichlet process
